post.heading: Check That Your Template is the Right Scale
post.p: Use a 3d-printed part to check that it fits the template exactly.
If it fits, go on to "Tape Together Your 2d-Template".

If it doesn't fit, check your 2d-printer's settings. Many printers have a setting called "scale to fit page" or similar. You probably need to turn off that setting and try 2d-printing the template again.
If you're using US letter sized paper, see special instructions in the repo.
